io.micronaut.views.freemarker

Class FreemarkerViewsRenderer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.views.freemarker.FreemarkerViewsRenderer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The model type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, ViewsRenderer<T>

    @Requires(property="micronaut.views.freemarker.enabled",notEquals="false") @Requires(classes=freemarker.template.Configuration.class)
 @Singleton
public class FreemarkerViewsRenderer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewsRenderer<T>
    Renders Views with FreeMarker Java template engine.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Jerónimo López
    See Also:
    freemarker.apache.org
